column4: hi there, having some issues - had laptop with ONLY ubuntu, resize partition with GPARTED - worked fine
booted with XP and attempted to install, install failed on the new 10GB partition
now I can't boot to Ubuntu
I get  a "no bootable device" or similar
Rough. Did you copy out your bootsector before doing this?
I run 11.04 but I'm on 7.10 LiveCD - is there a way to repair grub?
no, I didn't do any additional steps
so I was running grub 2 afaik
Did you try holding shift while booting to see if you can get the grub2 menu to come up?
Is my install completely screwed? rationalOgre
I'll have to try that now :-(
need to move off liveCD obviously to book :-S
